item.title: NBCU Says Surge in Sports Ads Boosts Upfront Sales Haul
item.description: People still want to watch sports on TV, and that means — at least for now — advertisers still need to spend on it. NBCUniversal said Tuesday that its new 11-year deal for NBA rights resul
